description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

Creative Writing: imagine a scenario

What kind of camera was it? What kind of pictures was the camera taking?

This week's topic: The camera captured the images... (90-110 words)

范例1：

To find out the identity of the two people he encountered, perhaps he should start with the camera. He wondered what pictures might have been taken. Hodge reached for his jacket and felt around for the equipment. He furrowed his brows when the only thing he retrieved was his wallet. He double-checked all the pockets, but the camera was nowhere to be found. There were only two possibilities. He had either dropped it during the fight with the figure in black, or on his way back to the apartment. He believed it to be the former. In that case, he needed to locate the man in black.

title: 英文天天写：Invitation(XXI)

description:
Now, Pierre Dulaine is an Irish-Palestinian ballroom dancing champion who's been using his talent to change the lives of troubled children and homeless adults for 20 years. His family moved to the English Midlands from their hometown of Jafa in Israel, following the Arab-Israeli war of 1948. When he returned home for the first time in 2010, he started a new dance project, bringing the children of the volatile Arab and Jewish Israeli communities together, very close together, in a tango embrace. The project is a subject of a new film. When I spoke to him from our New York studio yesterday, on the morning of his 70th birthday, I asked him if his talent was obvious when he took his first dance class.

Not at all. I was so, so bad.

Really?

I really mean that. I mean, I'm not trying to be humble here at all. I mean, the thing is, I grew up in the Middle East. All I knew was the Middle Eastern music. And then coming to, to Birmingham, and this teacher of mine's telling me. "No. It's one, two... I said no! It's one, two, three." What is she talking about? What's one, two, three? Trying to teach me the waltz. So.

So your, your rhythms were completely different.

Completely, not even on the same hemisphere. No, completely different. Yes.

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

歌曲介绍：

这首歌是非常经典的爵士音乐作品，曾经在多部电影中作为插曲出现，渲染温馨美好的氛围。
最早是出现在米高梅公司于1939年出品的童话音乐片《绿野仙踪》（The Wizard of OZ）。
在第12届奥斯卡颁奖典礼中，这部电影获得了最佳原创音乐和最佳歌曲奖。
《绿野仙踪》在开始时是黑白片，在小女孩进入梦境后变成了彩色画面，并配上《飞跃彩虹》的音乐，让许多人留下童年璀璨的回忆。
这首由哈罗德·阿伦（Harold Arlen）作曲的歌曲融合了流行音乐和美洲黑人音乐的风格，在片中由秀兰·邓波儿和朱迪嘉兰演唱，曾在排行榜首位达7周之久。此后还多次被人翻唱，被誉为最成功的电影歌曲之一。

Somewhere Over The Rainbow

模唱片段：

somewhere over the rainbow way up high
there's a land that i heard of once in a lullaby
somewhere over the rainbow skies are blue
and the dreams that you dare to dream really do come true
someday i'll wish upon a star
and wake up where the clouds are far behind me

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Somewhere Over The Rainbow

description:
Meanwhile, firmly back on dry land in fact on the A13. A Welsh construction manager called Ivan Locke, played by Tom Hardy, does nothing but drive. It's the night before the biggest moment in his career, as the guy responsible for pouring the concrete on the largest building site in the country. And his family life is about to completely implode, as he talks to colleagues and loved ones, including his wife, over a speakerphone.

Ivan's the kind of character we haven't really seen before certainly in mainstream movies, a floored, obsessive, but decent, thoughtful working man determine to not panic or curl into bitterness or hysteria, but just stay calm. What's also remarkable about the film is that no other actor physically appears in it, only those voices over the phone. And the movie never cuts away to other scenes, it just stays in the car for almost 90 minutes. "Locke" was written and directed by Steven Knight, co-creator back in 1998 of "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?", and he told me how to make a film about a man driving on the motorway.

There's always a very logical practical reason to not do the obvious thing when you're making a film. But it's since at the level of controlling this, I decided to do it almost in a naive way, to do it in the most obvious way. So we put three cameras inside the vehicle. And I said action only once and we shot the film from beginning to end at least once a night, sometimes twice a night so that we ended after eight nights of shooting, we had 16 movies to take to the cutting room.

description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于你，一定要买iPhone6的原因的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

CONTENT：
Apple calls the iPhone 6's new 4.7- and 5.5-inch diagonal screens "Retina HD displays." That's a marketing term and something of a misnomer: a tautological way of talking about technology that's already outpaced your eye's ability to spot discrete pixels.
But for those that like bigger numbers, the displays are notably higher resolution: 1334 by 750 pixels (326 pixels per inch, or over one million pixels, a tick higher than 720p) for the iPhone 6 and 1920 by 1080 pixels (401 pixels per inch, or over two million pixels, and native 1080p) for the iPhone 6 Plus. The new screens also have broader viewing angles, says Apple, and the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus have dramatically higher 1400:1 and 1300:1 contrast ratios, respectively, compared with the 4-inch 1136 by 640 pixels (326 pixels per inch) screen with 800:1 contrast ratio found on past models.
 
KEYWORDS:  
diagonal                                     adj. 对角线的; 斜线的
tautological                                 adj. 同义反复的
discrete                                      adj. 分离的
pixel                                           n. （显示器或电视机图像的）像素
dramatically                                 adv. 戏剧性地，引人注目地
contrast ratio                              对比率; 对比度
 
REFERENCE：

http://time.com/3308580/iphone-6-buy-or-wait/

 
【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！

轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

苹果将iPhone 6新型的4.7-5.5英寸对角线屏幕设计称为“视网膜高清显像”。这是一个营销术语，且用词不当：同义反复地说明一种高于眼睛离散像素点能力的技术。
但对于那些只看数值，尤其是关注分辨率高低的人来说，iPhone 6像素高达1334×750（每英寸326个像素，或超过326个像素，略高于720p），而iPhone 6加强版则达到1920×1080像素（每英寸401个像素及以上，本地1080p）。新的屏幕拥有更广阔的视角，这说明苹果iPhone 6及其加强版的对比度已经在1400：1及1300：1的基础上大幅上提升，相较于4英寸1136×640像素（每英寸326个像素）的屏幕来说，以前的机型对比度为800：1。

参考译文2：
苹果将iPhone6新型的4.7-5.5英寸对角线屏幕称为“视网膜高清显示”。这是一个营销术语，并且用词不当：同义反复地说明一种技术，它已超过眼睛离散像素点的能力。
但对于那些只看数字的人，尤其是关注分辨率高不高的人来说，iPhone6能达到1334×750像素（每英寸326个像素，或超过326个像素，略高于720p），而iPhone6加强版达到1920×1080像素（每英寸401个像素及以上，本地1080p）。新的屏幕还有更广泛的视角，表示苹果iPhone6及其加强版的对比度已经在1400：1及1300：1基础上大幅上升，单独与4英寸1136×640像素（每英寸326个像素）的屏幕相比，以往该机型对比度为800：1。

description:
还在羡慕BBC播音员员一口地道标准的英式发音吗？想要练就纯正英音，《BBC英音模仿秀》帮你忙！《BBC英音模仿秀》是一档沪江部落的原创口语互动节目，主持人对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：vincit

22秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：

This will be the second time in a year that Manchester United have broken their own transfer record and it's further evidence that this is a club very much in search of a lift. It's a deal that surpasses the previous British record set when Fernando Torres joined Chelsea for 50 million in 2011. The question now is, will van Gaal strengthen in defence and in midfield - two areas where United remained short of quality.一年之内，曼联已经是第二次打破了自己的转会交易纪录，并且大量证据表明，曼城极度渴望得到提升。2011年时，托雷斯（Fernando Torres）加入切尔西的费用是5000万美元，而本次曼联的转会已经打破了先前英国的纪录。现在的问题是，范加尔（van Gaal）是否能够加强曼联中场的防卫，这一块曼联依旧薄弱。

语调示意图：

 

重点单词发音讲解： 
deal
quality

20秒音频：

小编模仿音频： 

模仿文本： In those studies, as in many others, patients listened to relaxing music like this.
Dr. Good found that her surgery patients took fewer opioids drugs when they listened to music. Taking fewer drugs is beneficial, Dr. Siedliecki says, because pain drugs are limited by their side effects. 如同其他许多研究一样，在这些研究中，病人会听这样的降压音乐。
Good博士发现当手术患者听了音乐后会减少服用镇痛药。Siedliecki表示镇痛药因其副作用而被限量使用，所以少用药是有好处的。

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人：Ludora

30秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：An American military judge this week sentenced Army Private Bradley Manning to 35 years in prison for espionage. Manning provided more than 700,000 classified files and other materials to the anti-secrecy website WikiLeaks. Officials have described the case as the largest leak of restricted documents in American history.

译文：本周美国一名军事法官判决陆军士兵布兰得利·曼宁因犯间谍罪获刑35年。士兵曼宁曾向反保密网站维基解密网提供了70多万份秘密档案和一些其他材料。相关官员称本案是美国历史上最大的机密文件泄漏案件。

重点单词发音讲解：

sentence\ˈsen-tən(t)sˌ-tənz\ ['sɛntəns]
espionage \ˈes-pē-ə-ˌnäzh\ ['ɛspɪənɑʒ]
classify \ˈkla-sə-ˌfī\ ['klæsɪfaɪ]
document \ˈdä-kyə-mənt, -kyü-\ [ˈdɑkjəmənt]

description:
《美剧天天秀》节目是沪江部落一档模仿类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语水平，在轻松看美剧的同时锻炼大家的口语能力。积极参与的童鞋还会得到主持的专业点评哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

原录音：

原文：

Clare:Alex and I can't just disagree.I mean, she has to turn everything into a fight.
Manny:Hmm, a strong, independent woman.Sounds like somebody else I know.
Clare:I was never hostile,thou.This -- this whole thing with the dress --Never had this problem with haley.
Manny:Maybe alex doesn't want to compete with her big sister.Maybe she's trying to create her own identity.Put her in a dress and she disappears.
Clare:For one afternoon.
Manny:I wouldn't give up being myself for even one second.
Clare:Sometimes it’s hard to remember you’re only ten years old.
Manny:And three-quarters.
Clare:Yeah.
